name: Sailor's Grave: Curse of the Cook
name_original: Sailor's Grave: Curse of the Cook
description:
Delve into the Silver Christine, a cruise ship that disappeared below the ocean surface. Collect the transmitters containing information about the ship's demise. Beware, as the murky ocean hides dark secrets.

This game is currently in development and this is the first pass build. If you have any feedback, questions or just anything, please don't hesitate to leave a comment!

We are always happy to see you sharing the game with your friends! 

Thank you for playing! :)

Programming - Patrik Selleby

Graphics and programming - Gabriel Ansgariusson

Sound credits:

https://freesound.org/people/SirBedlam/sounds/393824/

Special thanks to Lena Riise and Ida Lindqvist for the paintings that hang in the ship.
